_rate1.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_rate_IT_sector.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk1.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate2.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk2.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate3.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk3.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate4.description: The second lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 2 and above tax bracket 1.

_tbrk4.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 1 is taxed at tax rate 2.

_rate1_curr_law.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk1_curr_law.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate2_curr_law.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk3_curr_law.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate4_curr_law.description: The second lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 2 and above tax bracket 1.

_tbrk4_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 1 is taxed at tax rate 2.

_min_income_for_ssc.long_name: Minimum monthly threshold for social payment
_min_income_for_ssc.description: Threshold of the calculation basis for social payment below which there is no obligation

_max_income_pm_low_ssc.long_name: Maximum income pm for social payment at low rate of rate_sp_1
_max_income_pm_low_ssc.description: Threshold of the calculation basis for social payment is 500.000 *12 = 6,000,000 with rate of 3.5%

_percent_ssc_deductible.long_name: Percentage of social securities contribution that is deductible from wage income

_min_wage_pm.description: Rule for estimation of cap of social payment is minimum monthly salary of 68.000 multiple by 15 times

_rate_sp_1.description: Rate prescribed by law.For 2021 is 3.5%, for 2022 is 4.5% and 2023 is 5%
